WHAT ARE THE GAME'S SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS?

Minimum System Requirements:                          

  • Platform: PC/Windows
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600xt
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics Card: Geforce GTX 1660 Super
  • Storage: 3.4 GB Available Space / DEMO 800 MB
  • Language: English
  • Format: Zip File
  • System Type: x64

Recommended System Requirements:

  • Platform: PC/Windows
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600XT 6-Core 3.80 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics Card: Geforce RTX 3060 Ti
  • Storage: 3.4 GB Available Space / DEMO 800 MB
  • Language: English
  • Format: Zip File
  • System Type: x64
